title: should cho gath be a tank meat shield or an ap caster???
body:
**what is he meant to be?**
                 is he supposed to be a huge tank with cc and be an unstoppable wall or be an ap caster who does tons of dmg but cant face tank an entire teams rotation. Riot your need to make up your mind you cant have both, the way he is not is unacceptable he is a full tank who is able able to do 1000+ true dmg while having easily 4000+ hp he needs a hot fix and Riot needs to decide how this champion should be played

replies.body: Lmao, the cho gath circle jerk still going i see?  When he had the interaction w/ stoneplate and could get 1.8k feasts i agree that was broken, but right now he's mostly fine.

The thing that really ticks me off, they always call him a "tank" but he is absolutely a juggernaut.  He has all the things a jug has, good sustain (passive), low mobility, and high damage if he gets to melee range with you, can be kited fairly easily.   

People mistakenly call him a "tank" because thats what he builds, but he lacks things tanks are supposed to have, which is some mobility, more reliable CC, and oh yeah ANY defensive steroids.  But im pretty convinced the boards really don't care about the facts, they just want to complain.
